Sample Collection for the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal**

## **Overview**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (Canada), on behalf of the Department of Health [(Canadian Food Inspection Agency)], is soliciting proposals for **Sample Collection Services RFP**. This Request for Proposal (RFP) aims to engage a contractor to provide professional services for sample collection for the Canadian Food Inspection Agency.

## **General Information**

### **RFP Details**
- **RFP Number:** WS4320882934
- **Publication Date:** November 23, 2023
- **Closing Date:** April 18, 2024, at 14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 01, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2026

### **Tender Status**
Unfortunately, the tender announcement has been cancelled on April 18, 2024.

## **Trade Agreements**
- **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**
- **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**
- **Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement**
- **Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)**
- **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)**

## **Regions**
The services will be delivered within **Canada** for the Canadian Food Inspection Agency.

## **Contracting Entity Information**
- **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
- **Location:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

## **Contact Information**
- **Stefano, Samuel** (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email:** samuel.stefano@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## **Notice and Attachments**
The RFP notice and additional documentation can be found on the Ariba Discovery website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18092916?extsite=MTgwOTI5MTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### **Cancellation Notice**
Due to a recent posting error on the tendering website, the original tender closing deadline has been revised. Proposals are now due on May 01, 2024, at 14:00:00. All submissions received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

This rewritten text maintains all the essential components of the original text but refines the language to create a more professional and
